text: manitaril palar (matilmel punaiyaip pol) urutiyarra nilaimaiyil allahvai vanankukinranar. Avarkalai oru nanmai ataintal ataikkontu tirupti ataikinranar. Avarkalukku oru tinku erpattalo avarkal tankal mukattai (allahvai vittum) tiruppik kolkinranar. Ivarkal im'maiyilum marumaiyilum nastamataintu vittanar. Itutan (cantekamarra) telivana perum nastamakum
